name: One Arrow (GMTK 2019)
description:
My GMTK 2019 submission. This year's theme was "only one", so you're stuck with the one arrow I'm afraid.

Let me know your personal best in the comments!

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Charge and Shoot

Escape - Toggle Fullscreen

CREDITS:

Design, Code, Art (Hah) - TeriyakiPhantom

Music - www.bensound.com

Sound Effects - "Glass Smash, Bottle, F.wav", "Train Door Beep, B.wav" and "Pop, Low, A (H1).wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of www.freesound.org
